products.title: Velvet Steel Grey Roman Blind
products.description: Their soft-touch range of velvet fabrics add a touch of luxury and softness to your home. A multi-tonal fabric, their smooth velvet fabrics create depth when catching the light, and can create different looks depending on the time of day. From cosy winter mornings, to breezy summers, velvet fabrics have been a firm staple in home and fashion since the 1920s and 70s. This soft roman blind in steel grey, introduces trending grey to your home.

products.title: Crushed Velvet Steel Roman Blind
products.description: An affordable alternative to velvet, their velour fabrics bring elegance and rich texture to your home. Produced in yorkshire, we've included soft shades in their collection which tie in with any theme. Silvery, plush and ever popular. Their steel roman blind using a crushed velvet fabric compliments any neutral theme. A feel of velvet and a touch of elegance bringing a true luxury feel to your home.
